channel.title: Height#2. I give up? No ty

item.title: Height#2. I give up? No ty
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Ffs… I’ve been at this for weeks… And still nothing… GRR.

Does anyone know the height mask?! For player gfx? Example.

mask100var1 = id; = Id of the graphic
mask100var2 = delay; Time before graphic is created.

Now does anyone know the mask for height? To control the height of mask100var1 ?

Someone said it was an int in the method… He said it wasn’t the id, obviously. The only other int left is delay. He also said it was in the 40k’ish region…

But isn’t that the delay ?..

public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;

Who ever gives me the correct answer, PM me and you WILL get a reward… And it will be good.

Many thanks.

Read full topic
